additional_info: Version 0.31 Quick changes: - gave the text box even more breathing room - changed the colour of the left panel Version 0.3 BETA Added some features. Fixed: - Trending subs - Search box - 'My Rooms' hover colour - adjusted navbar shadow - changed logout and sound buttons Version 0.1 BETA Its still broken and stuff. This is an early build
